exercises.raw: Planks : 3 sets x 25 (60) sec x Bodyweight
exercises.name: Planks

exercises.raw: #26: Chest Press: adj#1 : 1 set x 15 reps x 70 lbs 1 set x 10-12 (15) reps x 80 lbs, 1 sets x 10 (12)  reps x 90 lbs,  1 set x 10  (12) reps x 100 lbs ( use top handle, breathe out when you push out, keep abs tight and you push…Bellybutton to the Spine)…1 min rest
exercises.name: Chest Press

exercises.raw: #24: Wide Lat Pull: adj#2: 1 set x 15 reps x 80 lbs, 2 sets x 12  (15) reps x 90 lbs: (thumbs in the corner and over the top, lean back 20 degrees and pull down to your collarbone, squeeze between your shoulder blades)
exercises.name: Wide Lat Pull
exercises.notes: thumbs in the corner and over the top, lean back 20 degrees and pull down to your collarbone, squeeze between your shoulder blades

exercises.raw: Bicycle abs: 3 sets x 15 (60) x Bodyweight ( tuck hands underneath chin, raise shoulder blades, keep abs tight and pedal legs)
exercises.name: Bicycle abs
exercises.notes: tuck hands underneath chin, raise shoulder blades, keep abs tight and pedal legs

exercises.raw: #28: Leg Press: adj#4 : 1 set x (15) reps x 90 lbs, 1 set x 10 (15) x 120lbs, 1 set x 10 (15)  reps x 140 lbs: 1 min rest ( bring legs down to 90 degrees , when you push up come close but DON’T lock out knees… push through your heels)
exercises.name: Leg Press
exercises.notes: bring legs down to 90 degrees , when you push up come close but DON’T lock out knees… push through your heels

exercises.raw: #9: Incline Chest Press: adj#27:  3 sets x (15) reps x 50 lbs 1 min rest
exercises.name: Incline Chest Press

exercises.raw: Super Set Seated Bicep Hammer Curls and Decline Ab Twist
exercises.name: Super Set Seated Bicep Hammer Curls and Decline Ab Twist

exercises.raw: Seated Bicep Hammer Curls: 3 sets x 15 reps x 15 lbs
exercises.name: Seated Bicep Hammer Curls

exercises.raw: #34: Decline Ab twist: adj#4: 3 sets x 10 (20) reps x 8 lbs med ball ( lean back with chest out, keep eye contact in the mirror and twist torso, keep abs tight when you breathe out)
exercises.name: Decline Ab twist
exercises.notes: lean back with chest out, keep eye contact in the mirror and twist torso, keep abs tight when you breathe out

exercises.raw: #20: Pec-Fly: 3 sets x 10 (20) reps x 50 lbs … 1 min rest ( think outside chest to inside of chest )
exercises.name: Pec-Fly
exercises.notes: think outside chest to inside of chest

exercises.raw: #13: Tricep Pushdowns/ Pulldowns: 3 sets x 15 Reps x 60lbs …1 min rest  ( Push down = 60, pull down = 50 palms down, thumbs on top, feet shoulder width apart, knees slightly bent, pushdown and roll knuckles to your  thighs)
exercises.name: Tricep Pushdowns/ Pulldowns
exercises.notes: Push down = 60, pull down = 50 palms down, thumbs on top, feet shoulder width apart, knees slightly bent, pushdown and roll knuckles to your  thighs
